templates.name: Generic model
templates.template:
<%
var modelName = $i.camelize( name ); 
var sampleData = JSON.parse( sample );
%>
/**
 * <%= modelName %>

 *
 * 
 * @param {Object} args - Argument object
   <% Object.keys( sampleData ).forEach( function(key) { %>
   <% var item = sampleData[key]; %>
 * @param {<%= item && item.constructor.name %>} args.<%= key %> - <%= key %>
   <% }) %>
 * @return
 */
 
 function <%= modelName %>(args){
<% for ( key in sampleData ) { %>
    this.<%= key %> = args.<%= key %>;
<% } %>
}
